--- revoke_select_on_view.sql
REVOKE SELECT ON VIEW singernames FROM ROLE hr_manager
--- AST
&ast.Revoke{
  Revoke:    0,
  Privilege: &ast.SelectPrivilegeOnView{
    Select: 7,
    Names:  []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 22,
        NameEnd: 33,
        Name:    "singernames",
      },
    },
  },
  Roles: []*ast.Ident{
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 44,
      NameEnd: 54,
      Name:    "hr_manager",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
REVOKE SELECT ON VIEW singernames FROM ROLE hr_manager
